scripts.test: npm run eslint; npm run mocha; npm run nsp
scripts.eslint: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint ./*.js http/*.js jwt/*.js public/*.js websocket/*.js zeromq/*.js test/*.js db/*.js
scripts.doc: ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md --files ./*.js http/*.js jwt/*.js public/*.js websocket/*.js zeromq/*.js test/*.js db/*.js > docs/API.md
scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/libs/images; parent=`ls ..`; if [ "$parent" = aliceo2-gui ]; then cp ../../jquery/dist/jquery.js public/libs; cp ../../jquery-ui-dist/jquery-ui.* public/libs; cp ../../jquery-ui-dist/images/* public/libs/images; else cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js public/libs; cp node_modules/jquery-ui-dist/jquery-ui.* public/libs; cp node_modules/jquery-ui-dist/images/* public/libs/images; fi
